translated: In order to demonstrate the benefit of removing the stain, he says:üîΩBy purifying the stain, one is not born in the cycle of existence.

original: sbyangs pa ni bstsal ba'o //
analyzed: sbyangs pa ni bstsal ba'o //
translated: Purifying means removing.

original: dri ma ni nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni dri ma'o //
analyzed: dri ma ni nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni dri ma'o //
translated: The stain is that which is the affliction.

original: 'khor sa med ces bya ba ni skabs med pa ste //
analyzed: 'khor sa med ces bya ba ni skabs med pa ste //
translated: The cycle of existence is the place of the king of existence.

original: 'dis ni yang srid pa'i las spangs par ston pa yin no //üîΩji ltar 'khor sa gnas dang gzhi'i phyogs yin pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'bras bu'i las dag kyang ji ltar byed pa po'i phyogs de ltar 'khor zhing ji ltar byed pa po'i dbang gis 'gro ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de yang spangs na ni 'phen
analyzed: 'dis ni yang srid pa'i las spangs par ston pa yin no // ji ltar 'khor sa gnas dang gzhi'i phyogs yin pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'bras bu'i las dag kyang ji ltar byed pa po'i phyogs de ltar 'khor zhing ji ltar byed pa po'i dbang gis 'gro ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de yang spangs na ni 'phen
translated: This shows that the karma of renewed existence is abandoned.

original: par byed pa med pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor sar mi 'jug go //
analyzed: par byed pa med pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor sar mi 'jug go //
translated: Just as the place of the cycle of existence is the place and basis of the king of existence, in the same way, the karma of the result of the cycle of existence is the place of the king of existence. Just as the king of existence moves in the place of the king of existence by the power of the agent, in the same way, when the affliction is abandoned, it does not enter the place of the king of existence of existence because there is no projecting.

original: gzhan dag ni sems kyi gnas dang bral ba zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni sems kyi gnas dang bral ba zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that it is free from the basis of the mind.

original: sems kyi gnas kyang lnga ste /
analyzed: sems kyi gnas kyang lnga ste /
translated: The basis of the mind is fivefold:

original: gnas par 'dod pa dang chos dang dge 'dun dang bslab pa dang / rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las gsungs so /
analyzed: gnas par 'dod pa dang chos dang dge 'dun dang bslab pa dang / rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las gsungs so /
translated: The S≈´tra says: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to abide, who wishes to be free from remorse, who wishes to have no regrets, who wishes to attain the easeful abiding of the mind, who wishes to attain and enter into concentration, who wishes to attain knowledge and insight, who wishes to truly know and see, should train in the higher virtue, should train in the higher thought, should train in the higher wisdom.‚Äù

original: skyon mi 'byung zhes gzhan dag tu brjod de sred pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyon mi 'byung zhes gzhan dag tu brjod de sred pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to have no faults‚Äù is stated elsewhere; it means ‚Äúone who wishes to be free from craving.‚Äù

original: dri ma sbyangs pa zhes bya ba 'di bstan pas yang brjod pa ni 'di gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩphyi nas skye dang rga mi 'thob //
analyzed: dri ma sbyangs pa zhes bya ba 'di bstan pas yang brjod pa ni 'di gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro // phyi nas skye dang rga mi 'thob //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni yang srid pa mi 'dzin cing de rnam par 'gyur ba yang thob par mi 'gyur te ;
translated: ‚ÄúOne who wishes to not obtain birth and aging again‚Äù means one who does not grasp renewed existence and who does not obtain its transformation.

original: 'dis bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu bstan to /
analyzed: 'dis bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu bstan to /

original: yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus ma gtogs par ni 'di la khyad par mi 'thob pa yin te //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus ma gtogs par ni 'di la khyad par mi 'thob pa yin te //

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir ngo tsha min la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir ngo tsha min la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: 'di na gang sngon zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: nga las rig byed thams cad ni khyod kyis bslabs te /

analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
